attributes.action: Citizenship should Also be given to key workers retail sector & delivery drivers
attributes.additional_details: A government should provide a citizenship Like NHS and health workers to those overseas key workers who are working in a retail sector and delivery driver.  Because they all are key workers and they are working on a front line in their sector during this COVID-19 situation.
attributes.background: A government should provide a citizenship Like NHS and health workers to those overseas key workers who are working in a retail sector and delivery driver.  Because they all are key workers and they are working on a front line in their sector during this COVID-19 situation.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Citizenship to all immigrant key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313825
